description: A reminder that the stream is rated 18+ (moan)
Erryday

name: !addcommand
description: (Cloudbot) Add a command directly from chat

name: !addquote
description: Add a quote through chat

name: !age
description: A more PG reminder that it's an 18+ stream (compared to !18)

name: !cleanit
description: A plea for Otto to CLEAN HIS DAMN BONG!

name: !command add
description: (Chatbot) Add a command directly from chat. Permissions: +a (everyone), +m (moderator), +s (subscriber)

name: !command cooldown
description: (Chatbot) Change a command's cooldown directly from chat (time can be 0)

name: !command count
description: Set the count of a custom counter command to a specific number

name: !command edit
description: (Chatbot) Edit a command directly from chat. Permissions: +a (everyone), +m (moderator), +s (subscriber)

name: !command remove
description: (Chatbot) Remove a command directly from chat

name: !death
description: Sets the death count to a specific number

name: !death +
description: Increases the death counter by 1

name: !death -
description: Decreases the death counter by 1

name: !editcommand
description: (Cloudbot) Edit a command directly from chat

name: !enable
description: (Chatbot) Enable/disable a command directly from chat

name: !glue+
description: Increases the horse killer counter by 1

name: !heylisten
description: For mods to catch Otto's attention

name: !hydrate
description: Let's everyone know to hydrate

name: !props
description: Give love to the target, displays the twitch URL (for shoutouts to non-streamers who are awesome

name: !quoteedit
description: Edit a quote through chat

name: !quoteremove
description: Remove a quote through chat

name: !rage+
description: Increases the rage counter, for when Otto gets the big mad and quits a game

name: !removecommand
description: (Cloudbot) Remove a command directly from chat

name: !setgame
description: Changes the stream game

name: !settitle
description: Changes the stream title

name: !s2
description: Shout out to the target viewer, diisplaying stream link and last played game

name: !slice+
description: (Ghost of Tsushima) Increases the Nobu cut counter

name: !stretch
description: Reminds Otto that it's about time for a stretch

name: !victory
description: For the greatest, and smallest of achievements

name: !waitwhat+
description: Increases the waitwhat counter (when someone remembers to)
